title: As a user I want the contract language advanced search to return results
custom_steps:
Update the contract langauge advanced search to use dbms_lob.instr (or other functions in that package) to improve performance.

Example SQL showing usage:

select 
   langdata.LANGUAGE_DATA_ID
from 
   LANGUAGE_CUSTOM cust 
JOIN (select CLAUSE_TYPE_ID from clause_type_lkup where language_level_id = 2) clauseType 
    on clauseType.CLAUSE_TYPE_ID = cust.CLAUSE_TYPE_ID
Join LANGUAGE_DATA langdata 
    on cust.LANGUAGE_DATA_ID = langdata.LANGUAGE_DATA_ID
where 
   dbms_lob.instr(lower(LANGUAGE_DATA_CLOB_SEARCHABLE),'recoup')>0;

title: As a developer I want ebis to use Okta for authentication rather than Oauth
As an EBIS User I would like to be able to see/modify player profiles even if BAMStats is down
custom_steps:
As an EBIS User I would like to be able to see/modify player profiles even if BAMStats is down

Acceptance Criteria
If we get anything other than a 3xx response code from BAMSTATS, still allow the EBIS player profiles to function.

title: As a BOC User, I want to see a "Reason" column added to the Taxi Squad Utility
custom_steps:
Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Taxi+Squad

Wires:
View: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=taxi_squad
Edit: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=edit_-_taxi_squad

AC:
 - There will be a new "Reason" column added to the Taxi Squad widget.
 - The "Reason" column will appear after the "Time" column
 - The column will be a dropdown and the values will be:
-- Blank  
-- Acclimation Day / Workout
-- To Potentially Replace An Injured Player
 - The column will be Required.

 - There will be a new "Injured Player" column added to the Taxi Squad widget.
 - The "Injured Player" column appear after the "Reason" column
 - If "To Potentially Replace An Injured Player" is selected as the answer for the Reason column, "Injured Player" column becomes required.
 - If "Acclimation Day / Workout" is selected as the answer for the Reason column, "Injured Player" column is not required.
 - The column will be a select2 populated with all the players in the selected Org.

title: As a User I want to only see 26, 28 and 40 man roster options for new minor contract Addendum B's
custom_steps:
When creating a new minor contract the Foreign Team Inquiry, Release Clause and Assignment Clause Addendum Bs should only display 26 man, 28 Man and 40 man in the roster type dropdown. 

AC:
- 26 Man, 28 Man, 40 Man are the only options in the roster type dropdown
- 25 Man is removed from the roster type dropdown

title: As a User I want to see 25 man roster displayed historically on old minor contract's with the appropriate Addendum Bs
custom_steps:
When viewing a 2018 or earlier minor contract with a Foreign Team Inquiry, Release Clause or Assignment Clause Addendum B that has 25 man roster selected as its type, the value should still display.

AC:
- 25 Man is visible when loading a 2018 or earlier minor contract

title: As a User, I want to have new All MLB Team awards added
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be three new awards added to the Award Entry Utility:
  -- All MLB - First Team
  -- All MLB - Second Team
  -- All MLB - Third Team
 - These awards will be League agnostic
 - Players will be entered by position
  -- Use same positions as All Star game award
  -- No limit to number of players at each position
 - There is no Voting or point system for these awards
  -- Will work similar to All Star Selection
 - Awards will be available for awards bonus clauses on MJCs
 - Awards will be automatically system checked
  -- If the player receives the award, the bonus is earned

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want EBIS to Send Request Information to the Drug Testing System (DTS) through a messaging Queue
custom_steps:
EBIS will need to send/make available certain data points to DTS so the Collector can locate the player and process the request:

Reqs:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=138959058

AC:
 - When the status of a Drug Test Request is updated to "Consent Signed / Test Pending" the messaging queue will fire and deliver the appropriate data points to DTS

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want the Drug Testing System (DTS) to Send Information to EBIS through a messaging queue
custom_steps:
EBIS will need to receive certain data points from DTS so the Drug Testing Admins can be up to speed on the progress of the test and notify clubs:


Reqs:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Testing+System+%28DTS%29+to+EBIS

AC
 - Set up the messaging queue
 - Set up a listener to process the request
 - Update the request in the database

title: Rewrite MJC Stat Batch to use BAM Stats API
custom_steps:
AC:
 - The MJC Stat batch will be rewritten to utilize the BAM Stats API
 - Following the rewrite, the batches performance will be greatly improved
 - Marking bonuses earned or not
  -- Applies to each bonus type

title: As a developer I want the Nightly Potential MN FA batch to use views to get its initial population rather than inline SQLs
custom_steps: Currently the NightlyPotentialFABatchService is using hardcoded inline SQLs to get its initial population.  That should be updated to pull from a view so changes to the population can be easily tweaked.

title: As a developer I want the Potential MN FA Year batch to use views to get its initial population rather than inline SQLs
custom_steps:
Currently the PotentialMnFAYearBatchService is using hardcoded inline SQLs to get its initial population.  That should be updated to pull from a view so changes to the population can be easily tweaked.

Some (or all) of the updates for this story may be handled by #167908598

title: As a user I want the potential mn fa batches to mark players as pot mn fa NO when their current contract year is voided and they are in the last year of their MNC.
custom_steps:
Currently the nightly potential mn fa batch (and the year batch as well) are treating players who have 1 year remaining on their contract and the current year voided as potential MN FAs when they should instead be marked as a "no".

Note: once an organizations last minor league club has passed its last game and last playoff game date ALL players with one year remaining will flip to 'no' including the players in this population - adjusting those dates (most end around sept 5th) may be necessary for this story

Some example players to look at:
Devin Mesoraco (339319)
Ronald Torreyes (359806)

title: MJC stat batch takes over an hour to run every night
custom_steps:
Investigate speeding up the MJC stat batch - it is by far the slowest batch.

As part of this we can also look at cutting over its queries to run against the BAM stats API.

one thing that should speed it up is instead of running queries on a per contract basis, run the queries up front and pass that information in to the calculations
